title: gamstan
author: gamstan
content: Welcome to mBitcasino!Massive 110% up to 1 BTC First Deposit Bonus + 300 Free Spins at mBitcasinoBegin your crypto adventure with double the funds and hundreds of spins! Make your 1st deposit now, and we’re going to give you a 110% bonus on the house, up to 1 BTC (or other cryptocurrency equivalents).Get 300 Free Spins on top of your 110% Bonus by making the 1st deposit of at least 5 mBTC (0.005 BTC). You can use these 1st deposit spins to trigger massive wins on mBitcasino's most popular slots!Bitty is here to guide you on your journey to crypto jackpots. By claiming your 1st Deposit Bonus and Free Spins, you are already a few steps ahead on your quest for crypto wins.Your 1st Deposit Package offers:    a 110% Deposit Bonus up to 1 BTC (or other cryptocurrency equivalents)    300 Free Spins (if you deposit a minimum of 0.005 BTC)That's right! mBitcasino is doubling your crypto funds and offers you a mouth-dropping 300 Free Spins on top of your 1st deposit.The (300) Free Spins for your first deposit will be added to your account in full instantly, provided you have enabled this package.You can start playing them on the hottest slots at mBitcasino and trigger massive wins!

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: gamstan on August 31, 2022, 06:22:26 PMWelcome to mBitcasino!~@gamstan, are you the official representative of mBit casino on the forum? I am not sure that it is allowed to have more than one thread per site. mBit Casino already has an announcement thread on the bitcointalk forum, since 2014:mBit Casino | 24/7 Live Dealers, 250+ Games and growing, Chat Support, Licensed

comments.author: gamstan
comments.body: I am from the marketing team.I see the post but is very old. The new domain is it with .io, the domain .com just redirect you there.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: gamstan on September 01, 2022, 07:23:46 AMI am from the marketing team.I see the post but is very old. The new domain is it with .io, the domain .com just redirect you there.I will not recommend your site to anyone on this forum, until this is solved:I need advice from experienced users of this forumIn the OP, check the link to see the what I am talking about. You do not have a responsive official account on this forum, your official thread is not active, one of the reasons I won't recommend your service to anyone on this forum.

Then, you will have to explain to tye forum the real relationship between the new and old Mbit.

comments.author: gamstan

Thanks!At least we have heard "someone" from the team regarding this issue as it has been in this community for many days now and we need some answers.Hopefully, you can get back to us the soonest to see if there is a closure on it, otherwise those accusing will continue to let the community know about your casino, just saying and your reputation will take a hit.

comments.author: FatFork

Do you still have access to it?If you really are part of the MBit team, then you should first try to fix the currently open accusation: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5411872.0 Second, you should probably get a copper membership so you can create a proper ANN post for your casino.

Thanks!its good that at least there are some light from the problem this site facing ,  , but what made this unusual that after an account place His second post about this site https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5411872.msg60858492#msg60858492then couple hours after then you created this thread when the Mbit Original thread had been abandoned for quite some time?but Hope that the team will response to that issue and may resolved after.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: FatFork on September 01, 2022, 08:58:46 AMIf you really are part of the MBit team, then you should first try to fix the currently open accusation: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5411872.0I agree with you, if it is true that he is part of MBit, he should solve the problems experienced by users who bet on the MBit site.There are some other allegations that have not been resolved by MBit, the OP can see them here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=83.0Of course, if they don't want to respond to problems that occur to MBit users, I suggest avoiding betting on MBit sites, otherwise new problems will haunt you.

comments.author: Taskford
comments.body: Its not verified yet that OP is part of mbit team and newbies or the past scam victims of this casino should be more careful because OP might exploiting the incident and try to catch the attention of the victims then act to help them up then ask some amount from them to recover their funds or even work with it. Don't get fooled guys and be vigilant because scammers are doing some nasty tricks to scam newbies.

I just searched for the reviews you got, and it seems that you have a very bad reputation based on these reviews which I found to be "quality" reviews. You claim to have a license, but I don't see any logo of it through your website. Are you not regulated by an gambling commission?

Otherwise, we will also be forced to remember that this is a scam siteHaving their issues unfixed could ruin their reputation which has a huge impact on their trust rate. It could make other gamblers think of their site as a scam if they will just ignore their user's complaints. I hope theiy could address it properly and won't just make new threads as if no accusations are happening.

comments.author: Taskford
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on September 01, 2022, 12:55:29 PMQuote from: Taskford on September 01, 2022, 12:15:57 PMIts not verified yet that OP is part of mbit team and newbies or the past scam victims of this casino should be more careful because OP might exploiting the incident and try to catch the attention of the victims then act to help them up then ask some amount from them to recover their funds or even work with it. Don't get fooled guys and be vigilant because scammers are doing some nasty tricks to scam newbies.That's a good observation we have seen that happen a lot in the telegram channel, you know random people messaging you and asking you about the issue your issue then go on scamming you by pretending they are one of the team, there is a similarity on this, he must first prove that he is part of the team and if he is not he has no right to create a new announcement thread as there is already one existing. Its rampant there but this incident not only happen on telegram channel since this kind of attempts usually happens when there's a scam platform came out and this scammers use the same platform then pretend to be their representative so that they can convince those unfortunate victims that they can help them towards on their issues, but turns out they get scam again for another times so those victims should be aware on this since for sure this kind of scenario will surely exist everywhere.
